whatIsMutawif.title: What is Mutawif
whatIsMutawif.description: Mutawif is an <0>Umrah & Hajj worship guide</0> who ensures worship is performed according to <1>Islamic law</1>. Also known as a <2>religious guide</2> who accompanies pilgrims from preparation to implementation in the <3>Holy Land</3>.
keyPoints: Ensuring worship is performed according to Islamic law
Accompanying pilgrims from preparation to completion

requirements.heading: Certification Requirements
requirements.description: Prospective mutawif must meet the following requirements as a commitment to professionalism in accompanying Indonesian Umrah & Hajj and umrah pilgrims.
list: Minimum education of high school/MA or equivalent.
Able to communicate and guide pilgrims.
Submit administrative documents (ID card, diploma, passport photo, CV, and proof of experience).

process.title: Certification Process
process.description: Follow the certification flow from registration and document verification, self-assessment, competency test, result determination to certificate issuance.
steps: Competency Test: practice/simulation observation of guidance, interview, and knowledge test.
Result determination: Competent / Not Yet Competent.

discover.title: Mutawifnesia Program
discover.description: Mutawifnesia presents a professional mutawif certification program with an exclusive curriculum, certified mentors, and direct field experience in the Holy Land.
features: Learn directly from certified worship practitioners with national standard curriculum
Direct field practice in the Holy Land with experienced mentor guidance
Official certificate from LSP (Lembaga Sertifikasi Profesi)
Master Arabic for effective communication with pilgrims
Complete accommodation including meals, lodging throughout the program and other amenities

profile.subtitle: Institution Profile
profile.title: PT & LSP AHLAN
profile.description1: LSP AHLAN is a <0>Professional Certification Institution</0> committed to improving the competency standards of mutawif in Indonesia. We collaborate with the <1>National Professional Certification Board (BNSP)</1> and the Ministry of Religious Affairs of the Republic of Indonesia to produce professional and competent worship guides.
profile.description2: With more than 5 years of experience, we have certified hundreds of mutawif who are now actively serving pilgrims throughout Indonesia and the Holy Land.
